extendedInfo.description: 9News in Denver, Colorado is proud to announce a full featured weather app for Android.Featuresâ¢ Highly responsive interactive map optimized for 3G and WiFi performanceâ¢ Vertical and horizontal map display with loopingâ¢ NOWrad, the gold standard for radar in the weather industryâ¢ Highest resolution satellite cloud imagery availableâ¢ Exclusive patent pending Road Weather Indexâ¢ Color coded weather alerts arranged by severityâ¢ Fully integrated GPS for current location awarenessâ¢ Integrated compass overlayâ¢ Most accurate 10 day forecasts with both daily and hourly detailâ¢ Ability to easily save your favorite locationsâ¢ Full featured and user testedâ¢ Weather Widget for unlock pageâ¢ Earthquake Plottingâ¢ Storm Track Plottingâ¢ Tropical Track Plottingâ¢ Status bar alert acknowledgementâ¢ Alerts over map on/off switch in settingsâ¢ Additional Small Widgetâ¢ Widget Configuration (Daily or Hourly view)â¢ Watch/Warning (Alert) boxes on map. â¢ Spanish language support; NOTE: Language used in the app will reflect the overall language being used for the deviceâ¢ Ability to acknowledge Alerts from within the app â¢ Audio, LED, and vibrate for Alert Notifications â¢ Feature tips to help users more fully take advantage of app featuresâ¢ User controllable alerts - Allow the selection of all alerts or just critical alertsâ¢ Single activity scrolling menu

reviews.title: Constant alert update
reviews.comment: Please! I know when I\'m in a severe weather alert thanks to your app but it constantly buzzes at me to let me know that I\'m still in an alert an hour later. I got the alert the first time, and the second time, and so on and so forth. Unless something changes in the alert I shouldn\'t be constantly notified about the alert. It\'s kind of frustrating! Please address and resolve! Thank you.
reviews.author: Kent Wagner

reviews.title: Virtually worthless.
reviews.comment: App works fine as a program. 9News forecasting is awful. Predictions over 12 hrs out are inaccurate more often than not and are constantly changed. I have little to no faith in this forecasting svc. NOT recommended. Would give no stars if not reqd to give at least one to rate.
reviews.author: Aaron Lopez

reviews.title: Great landscape map, NOAA weather data.
reviews.comment: Landscape view is GREAT when in Map mode. Has radar, storm & cloud views. Good refresh rate. Has nothing to do with 9 News weather, uses National data. Predictions are consistent with NOAA, not TV reports. Local (GPS) results are more accurate than the regional ones (10-day etc are based from DIA).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok app, but runs nonstop & is a battery killer
reviews.comment: There is virtually no way to get this app to stop running other than to uninstall it. I was ok with it for the most part but recent stormy weather triggered an \"Alert\" notification on the app which began sucking the life out of my battery. The battery drain seemed to be minimized upon acknowledging the Alert, but subsequent Alerts (for the same previously acknowledged alert) restarted the battery drain. Nothing like going from 100% battery to 15% in the span of 30 minutes. Once I might think it was something else with the phone but seeing it over and over again is enough proof for me. I\'ll just visit the website if I need the weather instead of using this battery sucking app.
reviews.author: Adrian Trujillo

reviews.title: Get the story straight
reviews.comment: It\'s a pretty neat app. I like the radar and that\'s it. The forecast never matches what they say on their website or TV. There are much more accurate forecast apps out there. Save time and move on.
reviews.author: Chad Baillie

reviews.title: Great for denver weather
reviews.comment: Good for denver weather... But I wished it would show the weather for my specific area.
reviews.author: Carlie Snyder

reviews.title: Decent, but...
reviews.comment: I watch 9 news and the weather app never matches what the channel predicts.  It is not uncommon for the app and the channel to be more than 5\302\272 apart from each other. I would like to see better consistency between the 2
reviews.author: Daniel Braum

reviews.comment: Excellent excellent
reviews.author: James Ott

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: The widget keeps disappearing from my home screen. Fix it and fix it now
reviews.author: Rick Kelly

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: App refuses to notice GPS. Sesrching for location. I have my GPS  on WIFI on and a full signal and it still can\'t find my current location or even Denver. Needs a bug fix.
reviews.author: Naomi Kohrs

reviews.comment: Very good just what I wanted
reviews.author: Bob Chappell

reviews.title: Great map
reviews.comment: Great app, one flaw - won\'t show map based on the current time. Always shows the map based on the last time I used the app. Have to clear it from memory for it to use the current time.
reviews.author: Gerry Newton

reviews.title: The worst weather app
reviews.comment: How about Snow Accumulations? This app sucks. You shouldnt have used weather bug
reviews.author: joseph cortez

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Constantly running/uses up battery.... Weather alerts keep alerting! I uninstalled to conserve battery usage; decided to go to weather channel instead.
reviews.author: Ana Alexis Keller

reviews.title: Best weather app!
reviews.comment: Love the live radar!
reviews.author: Lila Ravve

reviews.title: Why Boston?
reviews.comment: I like this app for the most part, but why does it always go to Boston? And if I add a city and delete Boston it will stay there until the next time I check in and my added city is gone and Boston is back! I don\'t care what the temp is in Boston!!! Please fix this!
reviews.author: Dana Cassidy

reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.comment: Seems to have a hard time zeroing in on current location.  No matter where I\'m at it just keeps \"thinking\".  Decent maps for current weather in the area though.  No weather app is great and this one is free and local so just ok.
reviews.author: Tom Shepard

reviews.title: Never accurate!
reviews.comment: doesn\'t even match the news broadcasts on tv! wtf
reviews.author: Benjamin Darling

reviews.title: Boycott 9news political sleez cover-up.
reviews.comment: App deleted.  Boycott of 9news. Not news but pandering to political sleez bags.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awsome
reviews.author: Joe Horvat
